column4: I have a question: Using the 7.10 install disk, am i going to be able current system without formatting the whole partition, as in: keep my home directory and settings?
awwwhg my typing is terrible tonite
I have a question: Using the 7.10 install disk, am i going to be able to update the  current system without formatting the whole partition, as in: keep my home directory and settings?
Using the LiveCD Desktop installer, no, the partitions will be formatted *unless* you have a separate partition for /home.
